titles.title: A bill to provide for the conversion of temporary judgeships for the districts of Hawaii and Kansas to permanent judgeships.
A bill to provide for the conversion of temporary judgeships for the districts of Hawaii and Kansas to permanent judgeships.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Converts to permanent judgeships an existing temporary judgeship for the district of Hawaii and an existing temporary judgeship for the district of Kansas.
